Title: Brick Among Clay
Text: Almard Feros. Retired Trin worker, original line crew. The maintenance rep back in Trilnat says he’s my best shot at getting answers. He lives in Buglaton’s east side — brick rowhouse, surrounded by painted ones. I should look for that odd one out.
CompleteText: Found it. Brick house, untouched facade. Smells faintly like oil and steel. Time to knock and hope he's in the mood to talk.
